item.title: Inst-IT: Boosting Multimodal Instance Understanding via Explicit Visual Prompt Instruction Tuning
item.description: INST-IT boosts multimodal instance understanding by using explicit visual prompts for instruction tuning, achieving significant improvements on various benchmarks.
